type().Description: Returns the type of this Redirect.

Returns: the file associated with this redirect, or null if there is no such file
file().Description: Returns the @B_java#io#File_E@ source or destination associated with this redirect, or null if there is no such file.

Returns: true if this object is the same as the obj argument; false otherwise.
Parameters: Object: the reference object with which to compare.
equals(java.lang.Object).Description: Compares the specified object with this Redirect for equality. Returns true if and only if the two objects are identical or both objects are Redirect instances of the same type associated with non-null equal File instances.

Returns: a redirect to write to the specified file
Parameters: File: The File for the Redirect.
Throws: if the specified file is null
to(java.io.File).Description: Returns a redirect to write to the specified file. If the specified file exists when the subprocess is started, its previous contents will be discarded. It will always be true that

Returns: a redirect to read from the specified file
Parameters: File: The File for the Redirect.
Throws: if the specified file is null
from(java.io.File).Description: Returns a redirect to read from the specified file. It will always be true that

Returns: a redirect to append to the specified file
Parameters: File: The File for the Redirect.
Throws: if the specified file is null
appendTo(java.io.File).Description: Returns a redirect to append to the specified file. Each write operation first advances the position to the end of the file and then writes the requested data. Whether the advancement of the position and the writing of the data are done in a single atomic operation is system-dependent and therefore unspecified. It will always be true that

Returns: a hash code value for this Redirect
hashCode().Description: Returns a hash code value for this Redirect.

ClassDesc: Represents a source of subprocess input or a destination of subprocess output. Each Redirect instance is one of the following: the special value @B_java#lang#ProcessBuilder#Redirect#PIPE_E@ the special value @B_java#lang#ProcessBuilder#Redirect#INHERIT_E@ a redirection to read from a file, created by an invocation of @B_java#lang#ProcessBuilder#Redirect#from_E@ a redirection to write to a file, created by an invocation of @B_java#lang#ProcessBuilder#Redirect#to_E@ a redirection to append to a file, created by an invocation of @B_java#lang#ProcessBuilder#Redirect#appendTo_E@ Each of the above categories has an associated unique @B_java#lang#ProcessBuilder#Redirect#Type_E@.
